titlestmt.titleproper: Wanted Outlaw Posters Collection, 1911-1915: Finding Aid WC127

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-02-04 03:09:51 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid content adheres to that prescribed by Describing Archives: A Content Standard.

did.abstract: The Wanted Outlaws Posters Collection contains 10 wanted posters for horse theft, larceny, counterfeiting, and murder from Colorado, Idaho, Montana, South Dakota, Utah, and Wyoming.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains 10 wanted posters for horse theft, larceny, counterfeiting, and murder from Colorado, Idaho, Montana, South Dakota, Utah, and Wyoming. According to records, all but Frank De Challis were eventually captured.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research use.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. No further photoduplication of copies of material in the collection can be made when Princeton University Library does not own the original. Permission to publish material from the collection must be requested from the Associate University Librarian for Special Collections. The library has no information on the status of literary rights in the collection and researchers are responsible for determining any questions of copyright.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Digital images of the collection are available at: http://libweb.princeton.edu/libraries/firestone/rbsc/aids/WC127/.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Wanted Outlaws Posters Collection, Box and Folder Number; Special Collections, Princeton University Library.
